```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(kableExtra)
```

The current members of the Neural Network Reading Group are listed below.
```{r, echo=FALSE}

members <- data.frame(
  Members = c(
"Alexander Modell","Andi Wang","Andrea Becsek","Andrew Jones","Anthony Lee",
"Chang Zhang","Christophe Andrieu","Hamza Alawiye","Henry Reeve", "Ian Gallagher", 
"Jennifer Chakravarty","Mark Beaumont","Mathieu Gerber","Mauro Camara Escudero","Mingxuan Yi",
"Nick Whiteley","Patrick Rubin-Delanchy","Pierre-Aurelien Gilliot","Robert Allison","Sam Tickle",
"Song Liu","Tjun Yee Hoh"),
  Status =     c("PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", "PRESENTER", 
                 "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", "SPECTATOR", "SPECTATOR",
                 "SPECTATOR", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", 
                 "SPECTATOR", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", 
                 "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR")
)
knitr::kable(members) %>% 
  kable_styling() %>% 
  row_spec(which(members$Status == "PRESENTER"), bold=T, color="white", background="#0066ff") %>% 
  row_spec(which(members$Status == "SPECTATOR"), bold=T, color="white", background="#A8A8A8")
```
